ethereumsection.p: Add useful content, to help newcomers in their research. Crypto ELI5s from twitter, reddit, telegram: Post them to the original document. Highlight relationships between projects, bring context to their research.
Experienced Ethereum commmunity members link content, creating context for the ones who just start out. Newbs upvote and mentors gain reputation - purely anonymous and onchain.
Share your address book with friends, access database of labelled addresses and send money to users via their github or twitter name.
Trust score. Investment ratings. Security ratings. Entertainment value. Service score. Rate anything. Help metamask to keep their phishing database up to date. And view your friends ratings.

creatorsection.h3: Discover great content - Follow social recommendations
creatorsection.p: Exchange p2p recommendations: videos, music, restaurants, longread, movie. Add and receive content similar to the one you currently view.
Better data for brave ads. Allow anyone to put ads anywhere and match them with viewers. Users price the viewing time. Allowing for variable pricing.

usersection.p: Know another source, which says the opposite? Post it and get rewarded
Personalize websites. Follow lists like "darkmode anywhere" and edit the css of your favorite website.
